effects.name: Arcane Intellect
effects.description: Increases intellect by 31 for all raid members

effects.name: Amplify Magic
effects.description: Increases damage taken from spells by up to 75 and healing spells by up to 150

effects.name: Dampen Magic
effects.description: Decreasing damage taken from spells by up to 90 and healing spells by up to 180

effects.name: Polymorph
effects.description: Transforms the enemy into a sheep, forcing it to wander around for up to 50 seconds. While wandering, the sheep cannot attack or cast spells but will regenerate very quickly. Any damage will transform the target back into its normal form. Only one target can be polymorphed at a time. Only works on Beasts, Humanoids and Critters

effects.name: Spellsteal
effects.description: Steals a beneficial magic effect from the target

effects.name: Slow
effects.description: Reduces target's movement speed by 50%, increases the time between ranged attacks by 50% and increases casting time by 50%. If the target is immune to movement speed reductions this spell enters a 2 minute cooldown and still applies the other effects. Lasts 15 seconds. Slow can only affect one target at a time.
